room_title: Escape room "The Lost Kingdom" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: Jovanni greeted us for our escape room, The Lost Kingdom. This was our first escape room and we had a blast! What an amazing time! Highly recommended! We conquered the room with 3 minutes to spare. We canâ€™t wait to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Kingdom" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: Had a great time in my first escape room, The Lost Kingdom. The experience was enhanced by game master Jovanni and staff. A true gaming experience, laughs included. Thanks.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Kingdom" by Sherlock's Escape Rooms in Florence (KY)
review: I had a really great time going to my first ever escape room today with great friends. J was a really cool, nice and funny guy. I had a blast doing the Lost Kingdom - we solved the puzzle in time with 2 mins left to spare. Can't wait to go again!
